message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $20,000 price point. Would it be possible for you to consider a lower price? I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  To make it work, I could come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget constraints. I appreciate the reduction in price, however, I am still unable to meet the $17,000 price point. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Would this be acceptable?
